plot: With Jeremy's love life taking a surprising turn, Mark decides to seize the opportunity to catch up with a girl he has had a crush on since they were at university together.

Still puzzled by Jeremy's new gay relationship Mark is keen to get back with old university crush April, now a best selling writer, and asks her to dinner. Unfortunately she brings her husband and the evening is a disaster for Mark. Now owning to being bisexual Jeremy invites girlfriend Megan as well as boyfriend Joe and discovers the perils of troilism.—don @ minifie-1
